emptyState.title: No accounts yet
emptyState.description: Start managing your business relationships by creating your first account. Accounts represent companies or organizations you do business with.
emptyState.helpText: Tip: Accounts can have multiple contacts, opportunities, and orders associated with them. They're the foundation of your B2B relationships.
emptyState.noFiltersDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find what you're looking for.
